location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'List of scenes from the play the tragedy of Imaum Houssein'

mods.abstract: The scenes on the list are numbered one to fifty-four in the order in which they are supposed to be rehearsed. Some of the numbered scenes have pencil ticks against them, some of which match up to those scenes which feature in the published work.The reverse of the list includes a separate list of items deposited with Messrs Allen & Co including a further list of the scenes, a complete manuscript of the play and oil paintings.
